title: Can't choose my rewards. Stuck in this screen
body:
When I login, can't proceed further because of this screen.

Cannot choose any of the 3 champions. Can't click, highlighting works but nothing clicks.

Cannot press OK,

Stuck in this screen.

replies.body:
Hi KoreanJuggernaut,

~~Thanks for reporting this, we'll need to gather some logs to investigate further. If you'd like to help us dig into this:~~

~~1. Please download and install the [Hextech Repair Tool (HRT)](https://lolstatic-a.akamaihd.net/player-support/tools/hextech-repair-tool/latest/Hextech%20Repair%20Tool.msi). (If you've already got the HRT installed, uninstall it and then install this latest version.~~
~~2. Once you've opened the HRT, deselect the "Automatically Assign" and "Add Firewall Exceptions" options, we won't be needing those.~~
~~3. Click Start.~~
~~4. A .zip file will be created on your desktop called LoL Logs. Attach this file in an email to ocelivereports@riotgames.com~~

~~We will then pass these logs on for investigation. I'll be sharing these steps with everyone.~~

UPDATE: The logs we've collected are not revealing the cause of this issue. The team responsible for this issue is aware and is investigating. Current known workarounds (short of restarting or reinstalling the client completley) include:
- Opening Task Manager and ending the League of Legends process
- Temporarily lowering your screen resolution

Note that when you do successfully select the champion you want the champion isn't just added to your account, rather, it gives you a Hextech Crafting shard for a "champion permanent" which you can redeem for the champion or disenchant for essence from the Loot tab.

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/TFT-bug-report/ukhaHO6c-unclickable-daily-play Try alt tab to task manager and end task on the second league of legends program the game should still run then go back should fix also might help to run the game in 1280 x720 resolution.
i have the same issue here

Hi,
I have the same promblem. When I choose the reward, it stuck in the screen
Follow up - uninstalling and reinstalling client does not fix, still can't play as can't get past champion/reward selection screen.
Hi fuscular, can you try following the steps pinned at the top of this thread to help us collect logs?
Thanks. I've passed on your logs, I'll need to gather a bunch more from other players before I can get more traction on the issue.
Now fixed for me, thanks guys. Also got to catch up on the champs I missed, double thumbs up!

If reinstalling doesn't work the best advice I can offer is to submit a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

They can give you more personalised and specific advice.
Try spamming left click and esc when it loads up. Like 2nd or 3rd reboot doing that makes it pop back into home screen for me. But this will occur for day 5,6 and 7. So it feelsgoodman.

I have had this happen to me also. i spammed esc and left click on the champion i wanted and it seemed to work almost instantly. if anybody is stuck with this i reckon this is the best advice i can give as i have tried rebooting the client etc. I also never received the champion.

Hi Kotez

~~It does seem players are not getting their champions, I want to help the right team get to the bottom of this then maybe we can get the champs delivered to you and others retroactively (here's hoping).~~

~~If you'd like to help us dig into this:~~

~~1. Please download and install the [Hextech Repair Tool (HRT)](https://lolstatic-a.akamaihd.net/player-support/tools/hextech-repair-tool/latest/Hextech%20Repair%20Tool.msi). (If you've already got the HRT installed, uninstall it and then install this latest version.~~
~~2. Once you've opened the HRT, deselect the "Automatically Assign" and "Add Firewall Exceptions" options, we won't be needing those.~~
~~3. Click Start.~~
~~4. A .zip file will be created on your desktop called LoL Logs. Attach this file in an email to ocelivereports@riotgames.com~~

~~We will then pass these logs on for investigation.~~

UPDATE: The logs we've collected are not revealing the cause of this issue. The team responsible for this issue is aware and is investigating. Current known workarounds (short of restarting or reinstalling the client completley) include:
- Opening Task Manager and ending the League of Legends process
- Temporarily lowering your screen resolution

Note that when you do successfully select the champion you want the champion isn't just added to your account, rather, it gives you a Hextech Crafting shard for a "champion permanent" which you can redeem for the champion or disenchant for essence from the Loot tab.
That...is a very strange one. If possible, I'd recommend running a client repair. Failing that, reinstalling is probably going to be your best option.

Is there any way to get the champions we've missed? Brand and Thresh I've missed. I played the next day and thought that it might roll back to day 3 rewards but it gave me the error with day 4 rewards. I assume this will happen for 5,6 and 7. Would love some follow up and some insight if possible will run repair again and re-install.
Just re-logged after day 4 error and it booted me back into day 3 error.

Yep, having the same problem and there is no way to exit either so you just gotta refresh and reboot client. The first few times it takes you back to the same screen and then eventually it'll throw an exception and you can play the game again. I've missed mages and now supports, lvl 3-4 respectively. It would be dope to fix this for new players as they will surely not enjoy this and may be deterred.
